vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Judah(?) living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.4.19;
brother of: Hodiah (H1940)
§ Naham = "comfort"
the brother of IIodiah or Jehudijah, wife of Ezra
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
拿含 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "舒適"
一名猶大首長 (代上4:19)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
拿含 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "舒适"
一名犹大首长 (代上4:19)
